item.title: Live: Level 2 buzz! Midnight mass as hairdressers - and NZ - back in business
item.description:
Hairdressers are buzzing as they returned to work on the stroke of midnight, buoyed by the sight of loyal customers queuing in the street as the country moved to alert level 2.
